CustomField.description: Formula that states if a test case has any executions of an automation type.
CustomField.formula: if (and(Count_Automated_Executions__c <= 0,0=LEN(Ftest_Id__c)),"Manual", if (OR(ISNULL(Ftest_Id__c), LEN(Ftest_Id__c) == 0), "Automated w/o Annotation", "Automated and Annotated"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Can be in one of three values: Manual, Automated, and Incomplete Automation. Incomplete Automation = invalid annotation or Execution not Marked as Passed or Failed
CustomField.label: Is Automated and Annotated?
